page.title: 06LIVING IN HEDGE END
page.content:
Hedge End has become a very popular place to live.Many houses are still being built.Some people complain it has become too big. Employment is fairly high here.Though there are a few large industries in Hedge End it is easy to get to Eastleigh,Fareham and Southampton by road.There are also lots of shops in Hedge End which provide work. People can enjoy themselves in Hedge End if they like sport.There is a squash club,a swimming pool,and two recreation areas for children one of which has a play park. There are plenty of shops and most people can do all of their food shopping here.
There are several churches.Each year there is a local carnival and summer fete.
